answers.answer: hi,are you diabetic?.Neuropathy due to either diabetes,vitamin B deficiency,nerve pinch etc can lead to pins and needles sensation.Avoid any injuries to foot as it can aggravate swelling.Please consult doctor for proper evaluation.

question: hifor the past few weeks i have had pins and needles and it feels like my foot is swollen but its not i've not been to see a doctor over this yet just wondering if ya have any idea what it could be
title: pins and needles
